title: Nigeria’s infrastructure challenges dampen investors’ sentiment at UK-Africa summit
text:
Marketing Nigeria to investors at the UK-Africa Investment Summit in London should have been an easy task owing to the country’s glaring opportunities, but to some investors, its infrastructural challenges are too big a risk to overlook. According to three investors who spoke with BusinessDay at the summit on Monday, the investment opportunities in Nigeria…
